          <title>
            <string language="en">Air mixture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftmischung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mélange d'air</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mistura do ar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Miscela dell'aria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίγμα αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mezcla del aire</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows air as a mixture of gases. Oxygen and nitrogen are the two main gases in air.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">argon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Luft als Mischung der Gase.
Sauerstoff und Stickstoff ist die zwei Hauptgase in einer Luft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'air comme mélange 
des gaz. L'oxygène et l'azote sont les deux gaz principaux en 
air.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o ar como uma mistura 
dos gáses. O oxigênio e o nitrogênio são os dois gáses 
principais no ar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'aria come miscela 
dei gas. L'ossigeno e l'azoto sono i due gas principali in aria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αέρα ως μίγμα αερίων. 
Το οξυγόνο και το άζωτο είναι τα δύο βασικά αέρια στον 
αέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el aire como mezcla de 
gases. El oxígeno y el nitrógeno son los dos gases principales
en aire.</string>
          </description>
